page.syntax: Result as P = . Table_Alias as C

argument.name: Result
argument.description: A pointer to a component table of a set.

argument.name: Table_Alias
argument.description: The name alias of a table in the set.

page.description: The .TABLE_ALIAS method returns a pointer to a table in a set.
page.example: dim st as P dim tb as P st = set.open("invoice") tb = st.customer ? tb.name_get() = "Customer"
